message.content:
cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.SOC, cs.HC 

The paper proposes a recommendation system for Pinterest pinboards based on Twitter user interests. The system uses MultiLabel classification to map Twitter user followees to pinboard topics, which falls under the category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR). The visual diversification technique used for recommending pinboards is related to Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) and Social Computing (cs.SOC). The paper also discusses the significance of the proposed system for online social media users, which is related to Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC). Finally, the use of data analysis and machine learning techniques in the proposed system is related to Statistical Learning (cs.SD).
